feed.title: Channel-Port aux Basques - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Channel-Port aux Basques
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:36 AM NST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Port aux Basques 05:30 AM NST Sunday 05 March 2023
Temperature: -5.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 68 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -10.6°C
Wind: NW 29 km/h gust 40 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow and blowing snow beginning this morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 in the Port aux Basques area. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature rising to zero this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow ending overnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming light overnight. Temperature rising to zero this evening then falling. Wind chill minus 14 this evening. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 05 March 2023
